description: Add tags to, or update the tag values of, an App Runner resource. A tag is a key-value pair.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource that you want to update tags for. It must be the ARN of an App Runner resource.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tag key-value pairs to add or update. If a key is new to the resource, the tag is added with the provided value. If a key is already associated with the resource, the value of the tag is updated. (dict) --- Describes a tag that is applied to an App Runner resource. A tag is a metadata item consisting of a key-value pair. Key (string) --- The key of the tag. Value (string) --- The value of the tag.
